name: prosodically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or involves the rhythms and sounds of written or spoken language: Either the noun or the verb was prosodically highlighted by increased pitch and loudness. Stress has been found to prosodically constrain word recognition in Dutch speakers.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen children acquire their first language, one of their tasks is to learn how to organize their speech prosodically. The first word is unstressed, and therefore prosodically inferior to the second.
